sources.title: Chamber of Horrors
sources.description: Title: Chamber of Horrors Summary: A murder is found to be connected to a false heir and a secret underground torture chamber. Directed by: Norman Lee Actors: Leslie Banks, Lilli Palmer, Romilly Lunge Production Company: Rialto Productions Release Date: 20 December 1940 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A murder is found to be connected to a false heir and a secret underground torture chamber.

metadata.Plot: A murder is found to be connected to a false heir and a secret underground torture chamber.
metadata.Writer: Edgar Wallace, Norman Lee, Gilbert Gunn
metadata.Actors: Leslie Banks, Lilli Palmer, Romilly Lunge
